entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bas-Caraquet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 12:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

Humidity: 57 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A
